action_taken.description: A code representing the action taken on the loan.

action_taken_name.description: The action taken on the loan.

agency_code.description: A code representing the agency supervising the respondent.

agency_abbr.description: The abbreviation for the agency supervising the respondent.

applicant_ethnicity.description: A code representing the ethnicity of the primary applicant.

applicant_ethnicity_name.description: The ethnicity of the primary applicant.

applicant_income_000s.description: The income of the primary applicant, in thousands of dollars.

applicant_race_1.description: A code representing the first listed race for the primary applicant. The applicant can list up to five races.

applicant_race_2.description: A code representing the second listed race for the primary applicant.

applicant_race_3.description: A code representing the third listed race for the primary applicant.

applicant_race_4.description: A code representing the fourth listed race for the primary applicant.

applicant_race_5.description: A code representing the fifth listed race for the primary applicant.

applicant_race_name_1.description: The first listed race for the primary applicant. The applicant can list up to five races.

applicant_race_name_2.description: The second listed race for the primary applicant.

applicant_race_name_3.description: The third listed race for the primary applicant.

applicant_race_name_4.description: The fourth listed race for the primary applicant.

applicant_race_name_5.description: The fifth listed race for the primary applicant.

applicant_sex.description: A code representing the sex of the primary applicant.

applicant_sex_name.description: The sex of the primary applicant.

application_date_indicator.description: A code representing the date of the application. 0 means the application was made on or after 1/1/2004; 1 means the application was made before 1/1/2004; 2 means the application date is not available.

as_of_year.description: The reporting year of the HMDA record.

census_tract_number.description: The number of the census tract for the property.

co_applicant_ethnicity.description: A code representing the ethnicity of the co-applicant.

co_applicant_race_1.description: A code representing the first listed race for the co-applicant. The co-applicant can list up to five races.

co_applicant_race_2.description: A code representing the second listed race for the co-applicant.

co_applicant_race_3.description: A code representing the third listed race for the co-applicant.

co_applicant_race_4.description: A code representing the fourth listed race for the co-applicant.

co_applicant_race_5.description: A code representing the fifth listed race for the co-applicant.

co_applicant_race_name_1.description: The first listed race for the co-applicant. The co-applicant can list up to five races.

co_applicant_race_name_2.description: The second listed race for the co-applicant.

co_applicant_race_name_3.description: The third listed race for the co-applicant.

co_applicant_race_name_4.description: The fourth listed race for the co-applicant.

co_applicant_race_name_5.description: The fifth listed race for the co-applicant.

co_applicant_sex.description: A code representing the sex of the co-applicant.

county_code.description: A code representing the county of the property. This code is only unique when combined with the state code.

county_name.description: The name of the county containing the property.

denial_reason_1.description: A code representing the first reason for denial of the application. The application can be denied for up to three reasons.

denial_reason_2.description: A code representing the second reason for denial of the application.

denial_reason_3.description: A code representing the third reason for denial of the application.

denial_reason_name_1.description: The first reason for denial of the application. The application can be denied for up to three reasons.

denial_reason_name_2.description: The second reason for denial of the application.

denial_reason_name_3.description: The third reason for denial of the application.

edit_status.description: A code representing the edit failure status of the application.

edit_status_name.description: The edit failure status of the application.

hoepa_status.description: A code representing the HOEPA status of the application. This only applies to loans originated or purchased.

hoepa_status_name.description: The HOEPA status of the application.

hud_median_family_income.description: The median family income in dollars for the MSA/MD in which the tract is located.

lien_status.description: A code representing the lien status. Only applicable for applications and originations.

loan_amount_000s.description: The amount of the loan applied for, in thousands of dollars.

loan_purpose.description: A code representing the purpose of the loan.

loan_type.description: A code representing the type of loan applied for.

loan_type_name.description: The type of loan applied for.

minority_population.description: The percentage of minority population to total population for the census tract, carried to two decimal places.

msamd.description: A code representing the Metropolitian Statistical Area/Metropolitian Division (MSA/MD) the property is located in.

msamd_name.description: The Metropolitian Statistical Area/Metropolitian Division (MSA/MD) the property is located in.

number_of_1_to_4_family_units.description: The number of dwellings in the tract that are built to house fewer than 5 families.

number_of_owner_occupied_units.description: The number of dwellings in the tract that are lived in by the owner.

owner_occupancy.description: A code representing the owner-occupancy status of the property.

owner_occupancy_name.description: The owner-occupancy status of the property.

population.description: The total population in the tract.

preapproval.description: A code representing the preapproval status of the application.

preapproval_name.description: The preapproval status of the application.

property_type.description: A code representing the type of the property.

purchaser_type.description: A code representing the type of institution purchasing the loan.

purchaser_type_name.description: The type of institution purchasing the loan.

rate_spread.description: The rate spread for the loan.

respondent_id.description: A code representing the loan respondent.

state_code.description: A code representing the state the property is located in.

state_abbr.description: The two-letter abbreviation for the state the property is located in.

state_name.description: The name of the state the property is located in.

tract_to_msamd_income.description: The percentage of the median family income for the tract compared to the median family income for the MSA/MD, rounded to two decimal places.
